front.title: Considerations When Using Basic OSPF Convergence Benchmarks

abstract.t: This document discusses the applicability of various tests for measuring single router control plane convergence, specifically in regards to the Open Shortest First (OSPF) protocol. There are two general sections in this document, the first discussing specific advantages and limitations of specific OSPF convergence tests, and the second discussing more general pitfalls to be considered when testing routing protocols convergence testing.
